channel.title: - Need Help Changing Safe and Danger Zones In Satan's Isle -
channel.description:
Ok, so I want to make Entrana a "Safe" Spot, because, currently, it is a Pk spot. How do I change it to a safe spot?
I am using Satan's Isle.
Please help, and don't flame if the answer is so simple, Im a little new to Private Servers, so please help.
Thanks alot! ~Byty

item.title: - Need Help Changing Safe and Danger Zones In Satan's Isle -
item.dc:creator: @Byty Byty
item.description:
@Byty wrote:

[quote=“NexondotNet, post:3, topic:104354”][quote author=Byty link=topic=149334.msg1416001#msg1416001 date=1180775146]
Ok, so I want to make Entrana a “Safe” Spot, because, currently, it is a Pk spot. How do I change it to a safe spot?

I am using Satan’s Isle.

Please help, and don’t flame if the answer is so simple, Im a little new to Private Servers, so please help.

Thanks alot!
~Byty
[/quote]

Find

public boolean nonWild

I think you can work it out from there.[/quote]

Um, I cant find that in client.java

[quote="† Nirvana †, post:2, topic:104354"][quote author=Byty link=topic=149334.msg1416001#msg1416001 date=1180775146]
Ok, so I want to make Entrana a “Safe” Spot, because, currently, it is a Pk spot. How do I change it to a safe spot?

I am using Satan’s Isle.

Please help, and don’t flame if the answer is so simple, Im a little new to Private Servers, so please help.

Thanks alot!
~Byty
[/quote]

Ctrl + F

insafezone

It finds alot of “insafezone”, please explain more, Im a noob at this.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 01, 2007, 10:17:32 PM[/size][hr]Someone please help me! I need a detailed Tutorial, or post a link to one.

Thanks[br][size=1]Posted on: June 03, 2007, 01:33:14 PM[/size][hr]Someone please help…

I don’t know what to do…

Read full topic
